img_text: T-Mobile LTE 14:02 73% Andrew Osife March 6, 2018 Salt River. Me and Cardon Charles were at Walmart earlier today and an cashier was crying because she lost her tax money and said she wasn't going to make it thru the month. I felt bad so I gave her $200 because I just found $3000 dollars in the parking lot and I felt god blessed me so l should bless somebody else #PayitForward #Blessed
